rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"chainType","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"enum SignalTypes.SignalType","name":"signalType","type":"uint8"}],"name":"getDefaultThreshold","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"thresholdValue","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"chainId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"enum SignalTypes.SignalType","name":"signalType","type":"uint8"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"validateSignal","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"isValid","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"string","name":"reason","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Pluggable validator interface for different chain types  Different rollup types (Orbit, OP Stack, StarkNet, etc.) have different ways to prove chain health. This interface allows ChainWard to work with any rollup.  Examples: - OrbitValidator: Checks sequencer heartbeat + block time - OPStackValidator: Checks batch posting to Ethereum - StarkNetValidator: Checks state root updates on Starknet","kind":"dev","methods":{"chainType()":{"details":"Chain type identifier (e.g., \"ORBIT\", \"OP_STACK\", \"STARKNET\")"},"getDefaultThreshold(uint8)":{"details":"Get default threshold for a signal type on this chain","returns":{"thresholdValue":"The numeric threshold (e.g., 2 seconds for BLOCK_PRODUCED)"}},"validateSignal(uint256,uint8,bytes)":{"details":"Validate a health signal for this chain type","params":{"chainId":"The chain being monitored","data":"The proof data (encoded per signal type)","signalType":"What type of signal (BLOCK_PRODUCED, STATE_ROOT_CHANGED, etc.)"},"returns":{"isValid":"True if the signal is valid for this chain","reason":"Human-readable explanation if invalid"}}},"title":"IChainValidator","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/ChainTypeRegistry.sol":"IChainValidator"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/ChainTypeRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2d86f689cf98a1d8811f88c3382c593dfd91ece6d01effe93f542a1acf8a9cf2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ae035aef63c5d84c2c67c0980141e51e19d9a19f165d9b9f5d8842d956720a8b","dweb:/ipfs/QmSraP8YEkiKSoKbpMscgr2sFRpP2tk1r8M5nuDLvDnej1"]},"src/SignalTypes.sol":{"keccak256":"0x09514dc39660b665d1c39b17f4664c58ae8580005214bb08cf1933621288f666","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1876ce007cb50cfda92821abcb663a6cfdbba84a02072863b585ff71860958cc","dweb:/ipfs/QmZrYSZUPJkEGr8sAPCHz7gAMjk4DzkWCPgdAoXWmJ9gRZ"]}},"version":1}

getDefaultThreshold(uint8).details: Get default threshold for a signal type on this chain

returns.thresholdValue: The numeric threshold (e.g., 2 seconds for BLOCK_PRODUCED)

validateSignal(uint256,uint8,bytes).details: Validate a health signal for this chain type

params.data: The proof data (encoded per signal type)
params.signalType: What type of signal (BLOCK_PRODUCED, STATE_ROOT_CHANGED, etc.)

returns.isValid: True if the signal is valid for this chain
